column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bolin says : " Is n't this fun , huh ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " You guys got ta save me .
#Text=" Mako says : " I though you were breaking up with her .
#Text=What happened to " ripping off the leech " ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " I tried !
#Text=But anytime I bring up the subject , she threatens to freeze me in a block of ice and feed me to dolphin piranhas !
#Text=" Mako says : " So it was more like you tugged at the leech .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Yes , over and over and over , but it wo n't come off .
#Text=Why did n't you warn me your cousin had the power to reach into my heart and crush my soul with her bare hands .
#Text=" Korra says : " Uh , 'cause I thought it was pretty obvious ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " No , no , not to me it was n't .
#Text=I 'm very bad at reading people .
#Text=You should know that by now .
#Text=Oh , man .
#Text=Oh !
#Text=Do something , Avatar !
#Text="
